text: The 11th Cruiser Squadron and also known as Cruiser Force E was a formation of cruisers of the British Royal Navy from 1914 to 1917 and again from 1939 to 1940. ==History== ===First formation=== The squadron was first formed in July 1914 and was attached to the Third Fleet. In August 1914 it was reassigned to the Channel Fleet. It was designated Cruiser Force E for service off the west coast of Ireland and was dispersed by January 1915. ====Rear-Admiral/Senior Officer Commanding==== Included: {| class="wikitable" ! !! Rank !! Flag !! Name !! Term !! Wake ||24 May 1915 – 12 March 1917||promoted to Cdre 10/1915. RAdm in 04/1917 |- |} ===Second formation=== The squadron reformed in October 1939 when the 12th Cruiser Squadron of the Northern Patrol was re-designated 11th Cruiser Squadron it was then transferred to the North Atlantic Command until it was disbanded in 1940 ====Commodore Commanding==== Included: {| class="wikitable" ! !!
